text: enam 1959 sapthambar 26 wanida rathriye ragama batuwaththe diki soyisata ayath gewal siyaya niwasa kramaye pawathi ‘bal kamak’ ganaya.

ma me charithayata thora gath pasu, aya kotharam mata lengathu wunath, kamarawak issaraha eeta sadharanayak ishta karanna puluwanda kiyana abhiyogaya mata thibuna.

naya laba dimedi panawana kondesi ihala giyeya.siyalu aandu wisin gath naya gewa damime prashna mathuwiya.dolaraya hamuwe rupiyale agaya baldu wethdi gewiya yuthu naya poli anupatha sighrayen ihala giyeya.mewa ratak washayen apa siyalu denata muhuna dimata siduwana prashnaya.ek deshapalana pakshayakata ho ek pudgalayakuta pamanak mewa bala nopana bawa kawuruth therum ganima wadagathya.

aarakshaka amathyanshaye 'hula' namaththage pahasa labima hethuwen mewanawita aandolanathmaka deshapalana charithayak bawata pathwa sitina sudarmage palamu pemwatha chithrapata adhyakshawarayaku ha lekhakayaku wana sirimal wijesinha mahatha bawa pawase.80 dashakaye mul bhagaye hunupitiye gangaramaye ingrisi bhasha patamalawak hadaru tharuna tharuniyan athara mema asammatha yowun pem yuwala athishayin janapriyawa sita atha.kesewuwada 'salaka wyaparaye hawulkaruwaku wana gamini neththikumara mahatha, surupi nawa yowun tharuniyakwa siti sudarma daha ganimath samaga ema prema wruththanthaya nimawata pathwa thibe,gamini neththikumara pasugiya irida 'diwayina' puwath pathata di thibu sammukha sakachchawa anuwa ohu wiwaha wu sudharma neththikumara ohuta wada wishala washayen wayasin balaya.ee wana wita ohuda palamu kasadaya ahimi wi siti athara sudharma itha labala wayasa awurudu 20 ka pamana modara pradeshaye ithamath duppath palaka jiwath wu rumath tharuniyaki.jonda silwa rangahale pawathi kemadasa mastarge sangitha wada satahanaka sudharma tharuniya rangamin githa gayanayaka yedenawa dutu gamini neththikumara, kelinma ayage niwasata gos thama duwawa kasada bandinna kamathi yayi demawpiyanta pawasa thibe.duppath demawpiyoda diyaniya sallikara gaminita wikuna damimata kamathi wi atha.
